He was admitted to the emergency unit on 06/01 with severe pulmonary involvement on chest x-ray, and was continued on antibiotic therapy initiated in the emergency care unit, ceftriaxone daily on 05/01 and prophylactic dexamethasone and enoxaparin initiated. He was admitted to [organization] on 07/01, requiring orotracheal intubation and central venous catheterization. He presented septic shock on 14/01, and his antibiotic regimen was changed. He remained in bed at [organization]. He developed new septic shock on 24/01, and began using fluconazole for fungal coverage. He developed pneumomediastinum on 26/01 due to airway injury, and underwent conservative treatment. He underwent tracheostomy on 29/01. He presented reactive adrenal insufficiency and acneiform rash related to corticosteroid therapy, in addition to diarrhea treated empirically with the hypothesis of pseudomembranous colitis. Acinetobacter baumanii was isolated in the tracheal aspirate, but was not treated due to the lack of clinical repercussion. He presented progressive clinical improvement and was transferred to [organization], where he remained stable. He underwent fibroscopy and was evaluated by speech therapy on 02/03, with no residual airway injury identified and a soft diet was released. He was decannulated on 03/03, remaining eupneic and in condition to be discharged. Good general condition, alert, acyanotic, anicteric, afebrile, Glasgow 15, oxygen saturation 94% in room air with capped tracheostomy, respiratory rate 28 inspirations per minute, muscle strength grade 4 in upper and lower limbs, regular heart rhythm in two beats, normal sound sounds without murmurs. Heart rate 76, vesicular breath sounds present, symmetrical, without adventitious sounds, without use of accessory muscles. Flaccid, flat abdomen, painless to palpation, without masses or visceromegaly. Extremities: palpable peripheral pulses, without edema, absence of swelling of the calves. Presence of pressure ulcer in the left lower limb, without signs of infection. Tracheostomy fibroscopy. I advise [person] on outpatient follow-up visits for: head and neck surgery on 03/15 speech therapy on 03/25 reassessment of diet physiatry to be scheduled I advise [person] on home care for tracheostomy orifice, diet, exercise and care. I prescribe symptomatic medications. Aminc, head and neck surgery, speech therapy, physiatry. Good general condition, slim, conscious and oriented, moving all 4 limbs actively with grade 4 muscle strength, still not able to walk alone. Tracheostomy orifice occluded with dressing and eating a soft diet. No pain complaints.
question: कैटिन, छा मुंहिंजा कननि में सूरुको सुठो थी वियो आहे या न?
answer: तव्हां 'सुठी, मामुली' हालत में आहियो। तव्हां जी नाड़ी मामुली आहे, ऑक्सीजन जी संतृप्ति 94% ते मामुली आहे। ग्लासगो 15, बार। तव्हां पंहिंजे हथनि ऐं पैरनि में चोथें दर्जे जी हरकत सां महफ़ूज़ तरीक़े सां हली सघो था, पर आज़ादीअ सां न।

answer: तव्हां खे पंहिंजे भाउ जे इलाज लाइ वञणो आहे: 03/15 हवा जे ख़राबी लाइ सिर्फ सर्जरी ऐं 03/25 इलाज लाइ... तव्हां खे हिकु वक़्ति जो शेड्यूल ठाहिणो आहे फिज़ियोथेरेपी लाइ।

discharge_summary: 1. pneumonia, pulmonary metastasis? negative external rt pcr on 06/21 verified by surveillance on 06/23 2. syncope to be clarified neurocardiogenic? investigation suspended 3. consumptive syndrome due to duodenal papilla neoplasia. admission: 06/23/2020, discharge: 06/30/2020, stay: 07 d 05 h, location: ward, payer: sus. history of current illness admission: [person] referred from the emergency care unit, where he was hospitalized for 4 days. reports that 3 days ago he had a sudden episode of loss of consciousness, not preceded by prodromes, with follow-up appointment after a few seconds. level of consciousness without dysfunctions afterwards, without release of sphincters. reports only significant asthenia and fatigue associated. had 2 of these episodes on this day. had already had another similar syncope 20 days ago. He had several episodes of vomiting, which started 5 days ago and improved 2 days ago. His family called [organization] due to his condition. During the evaluation by the transport team, [person] reported an episode of fever (38.3 °C) and dry cough since 06/10. During hospitalization at [organization], he was given antibiotic therapy and referred [person] to our services. His syncope did not recur. He reported diarrhea for 15 days and improvement for 3 days, which is why his chemotherapy cycle was suspended. Upon admission, [person] was hemodynamically stable, breathing with a mask with a reservoir at 10 L/min, without respiratory distress, and denying any complaints at the moment. He is afebrile. Edema of the lower limbs, crackles, and reduced vesicular breath sounds on the left. [person] was pale and emaciated. No relevant results. Pleural fluid puncture and chest drain. Pneumonia, no pending tests. Antibiotic therapy: cefepime and clarithromycin. [person] evolves into death.

answer: You were sent to the 'Emergency Care Unit'. You were 'suddenly falling' 3 days ago and you had a high fever and pain. You had a high fever (38.3 degrees Celsius) and a dry cough.

question: छा वाक़ई माउ खे वेंटिलेटर ते रखणो पियो?
answer: 29 मई ते, जॾहिं तव्हां जो कोविड-19 टेस्ट पॉज़िटिव आयो, तव्हां खे 'एयरोवे इंट्यूबेशन एंड मैकेनिकल वेंटिलेशन' अस्पताल में दाख़िल कयो वियो ऐं तव्हां खे 'साह खणण में तक़लीफ़' थी।

question: मूंखे खंघ पई आयो। इन खे 'उह' चयो वियो।
answer: 6 अप्रैल 2010 ते, मरीज़ जो मुआइनो करण खां पोइ, संदसि रिपोर्ट में चयो वियो त "न्यूमोथोरैक्स ऐं एम्पाइमा ॿिन्ही वॾी हद ताईं हुआ।" इन जो मतलब हो त ॿिन्ही फेफड़नि जो सिलिसिलो थी वियो हो, ऐं सीने में हवा जमा थी वई हुई।

question: छा तव्हांखे मुंहिंजी टेप खे एडिट करण जी ज़रूरत आहे?
answer: अंदरि 'खोर निमोथ्रेक्स' (खोर निमबंध कुडाके) हो। इन सां गॾु, 'खोर उचा नाली' (खोर नाली) बि वधायो वियो। 2073/2074 में, 'येता नाली' हटाई वेई। खोर नाली उहिंई रही।

discharge_summary: 1. coronavirus infection onset of symptoms 02/17 orotracheal intubation 02/24 extubation 03/08 2. septic shock from pulmonary focus requiring vasoactive drug resolved: antibiotic therapy: ceftriaxone 02/23 03/02 clarithromycin 04/24 03/02 corticosteroid therapy: 02/24 03/09 3. critically ill polyneuropathy grade 2 strength upper limbs and lower limbs 4. pressure injury left lower limb grade i 5. your appointment scheduled with gynecology. on 03/24 for investigation. admission: 02/24/2020, discharge: 03/19/2020, stay: 22 d 21 h, location: ward, payer: sus. current: [person] with severe acute respiratory syndrome due to coronavirus, onset of symptoms on 02/17, requiring orotracheal intubation due to respiratory failure on 02/24, due to the possibility of associated bacterial pneumonia, antibiotic therapy with ceftriaxone and clarithromycin was performed. [person] presented satisfactory clinical evolution, and extubation was performed on 03/08, without complications. answer: तव्हांजे हेठि खाॼे पासे, हिकु 'आंडरुनि पेट जो दबाव' ग्रेड 1 आहे, जेको हेठि साॼे पासे, 'पेट जी कमर, ग्रेड 1' ते आहे। तव्हांजे पहिरियें केयर प्रोवाइडर तव्हांखे पहिरियें केयर यूनिट में हेठि साॼे पासे 'पेट जी कमर जा ड्रेसर' ॾिना।

question: सेप्टिक छाकाणि थींदो आहे?
answer: हुन खे "सेप्टिक शॉक एब्डोमिनल फोकस" ऐं "सेप्टिक शॉक हेमाटोसिस" जी तशख़ीस कई वेई। हुन जूं अलामतूं "आम कमज़ोरी, दस्त, ऐं घटि क्रिएटिनिन" ऐं "हेमोडायनामिक अस्थिरता" (लाल लकीरूं) शामिल हुयूं, तंहिंकरे हुन खे "नॉरएपिनेफ्रिन" (हिक दवा जेका लालाणो वधाईंदी आहे) वठणी पई।

answer: मुख़्तसर रिपोर्ट में चयो वियो आहे, "उमिर सां लाॻापियल सिहत जे मसइलनि जा क़ुदरती सबबनि जी सुञाणप कई वेई ऐं को बि ॿियो ख़तरे जो उनसुरु कोन हो ऐं हुन खे दिल जो दौरे ऐं फ़ालिज जो दज़बु थियो।"

[person] reports that [person] has had a progressive decline in her general health and diarrhea since yesterday, with 4 voluminous, watery bowel movements, without blood or pus, after 5 days of constipation. [person] also reports that [person] complained of chest pain this morning, but was unable to detail the characteristics of the pain. question: "सर्जिकल ट्रेकियोस्टॉमी" (पुठिअ जे हेठि भाङे में हिकु खुलण) जो सबबु छा हो?
answer: आख़िरी जुमले में, "the word that was shouted" खे "the word that was shouted" (उहो लफ़्ज़ जेको चयो वियो हो) लिखणु घुरिजे। 27/03 ते, "surgical tracheostomy" जो ज़िकरु कयो वियो हो। तव्हां खे 15/03 ते इंटुबेट कयो वियो हो।

question: छा नतीजो मिलियो?
answer: हिकु डॉक्टर खे बोलायो वियो, ऐं हुन मरीज़ जी 'नाड़ी जी दर' 0 धड़कन फी मिनट पाई, मॉनिटर ते को बि बिजलीअ जी सरगर्मी ज़ाहिर न थी। जिस्मानी जांच में 'को बि मरकज़ी रुकावट' न डि॒ठाई वेई... को बि परावर्तक सतह न, को बि परावर्तक कॉर्निया न, ऐं अखि जो नतीजो पॉज़िटिव निकतो।

discharge_summary: 1. pneumonia, pulmonary metastasis? negative external rt pcr on 06/21 verified by surveillance on 06/23 2. syncope to be clarified neurocardiogenic? investigation suspended 3. consumptive syndrome due to duodenal papilla neoplasia. admission: 06/23/2020, discharge: 06/30/2020, stay: 07 d 05 h, location: ward, payer: sus. history of current illness admission: [person] referred from the emergency care unit, where he was hospitalized for 4 days. reports that 3 days ago he had a sudden episode of loss of consciousness, not preceded by prodromes, with follow-up appointment after a few seconds. level of consciousness without dysfunctions afterwards, without release of sphincters. reports only significant asthenia and fatigue associated. had 2 of these episodes on this day. had already had another similar syncope 20 days ago. He had several episodes of vomiting, which started 5 days ago and improved 2 days ago. His family called [organization] due to his condition. During the evaluation by the transport team, [person] reported an episode of fever (38.3 °C) and dry cough since 06/10. During hospitalization at [organization], he was given antibiotic therapy and referred [person] to our services. His syncope did not recur. He reported diarrhea for 15 days and improvement for 3 days, which is why his chemotherapy cycle was suspended. Upon admission, [person] was hemodynamically stable, breathing with a mask with a reservoir at 10 L/min, without respiratory distress, and denying any complaints at the moment. He is afebrile. Edema of the lower limbs, crackles, and reduced vesicular breath sounds on the left. [person] was pale and emaciated. No relevant results. Pleural fluid puncture and chest drain. Pneumonia, no pending tests. Antibiotic therapy: cefepime and clarithromycin. [person] evolves into death.
question: छा मां इस्पतालि वञां?
answer: उन्हनि खे "पैराप्लेजिया, डिजिटल डिस्पनिया, होर्सनेस", "हाइपोक्सिमिया", "परपुरा", ऐं "हाइपोटेंशन" जी तशख़ीस कई वेई।

discharge_summary: admission: 23/02/2020, discharge: 09/03/2020, stay: 14 d, location: ward, payer: sus. [person], 65 years old, born and raised in [address], widower. problem: asthenia, worsening of basal dyspnea, drowsiness, desaturation, bladder indwelling urinary catheter with pyuria, hypotension and worsening of perfusion diagnostic hypotheses: 1. mixed shock: septic of urinary focus, weaning from norepinephrine on 25/02, cardiogenic, heart failure, due to decompensated alcoholic cardiomyopathy profile, weaning from dobutamine on 03/03 started tridil 26/02 and oral vasodilators on 27/02/2020. 2. acute kidney injury kdigo 3 creatinine: 6.57 urea: 348: acute ischemic tubular necrosis secondary to infection, SCR type 1 on renal replacement therapy since 02/23/2020. cultures: blood culture 02/23/2020: carbapenem-resistant Klebsiella pneumoniae in 2 samples at 22 and 42 h. urine culture 02/23/2020: carbapenem-resistant Klebsiella pneumoniae. history: systemic arterial hypertension, hypothyroidism? chronic liver disease, active significant alcoholism, active smoking 110 pack-years, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, presumed pulmonology evaluation on 08/18. Evolution: despite the culture showing Klebsiella pneumoniae carbapenemase, [person] showed a good clinical response to meropenem, thus concluding the use of meropenem 1000 mg 1x/day 500 mg post renal replacement therapy for 14 days dated 02/23/2020. He evolved with improvement in infectious parameters, afebrile, with no genitourinary or cardiorespiratory complaints. Latest laboratory tests: Hb: 12.4 ht: 37 platelets: 123 gb: 7.5 without deviation to the left. Undergoing follow-up with nephrology, daily hemodialysis was performed. Schedule: with completion of antibiotic therapy and maintenance of improvement in clinical parameters, discharged from [organization] on 03/09/2020. Scheduled by nephrology for follow-up on acute dialysis on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays, in the first shift.
question: छा मां बीमार आहियां?
answer: 23/02/2020 ऐं 23/02/2020 जे लाइ माउ ऐं पीउ जी मौत जी शरह खे "कार्बननेटम-रेज़िस्टेंट निमोनिया" (हिकु बैक्टीरिया) जे रूप में परिभाषित कयो वियो हो।

question: मिश्रित टॉस जो मक़्सदु छा आहे?
answer: पीठिअ वारी रिपोर्ट में 'मामूली चोट' जो बि ज़िकरु आहे। इन में 'म्यूकोर्मिकोसिस इंफ़ेक्शन', 'शराब पीअणु जे करे दिल जी धड़कन वधणु, कार्डियोमायोपैथी (तव्हांजे दिल जी) जो बि ज़िकरु आहे।

question: मुंहिंजे रिपोर्ट मूजिब मूं वटि हिकु 'रोधक' बैग आहे। मूंखे लॻे थो त मूंखे एंटीबायोटिक जी ज़रूरत पवंदी। (मॉर्फ़िन)
answer: Sarswati stated, "While Sanskrit was defined as 'the totality of values of a group of people', this definition takes the form of 'usage by a sage'".

answer: संदसि तारीख में शामिल आहे: "पुरानो धमनी वारो हाईपरटेंशन, हाइपोथायरायडिज्म? पुरानो जिगर जी बीमारी, वॾो शराब पीअंदड़, 11 सालनि खां दमे।"

question: छा तव्हां खे रोशनी हासिल करण में को मसइलो थियो? ऐं छा तव्हां खे रोशनी इस्तेमाल करण जी ज़रूरत पई?
answer: तव्हां खे निमोनिया जे करे साहु खणण में तक़लीफ़ थी ऐं तव्हां खे हस्पताल में दाख़िल कराइयो वियो। तव्हांजे साहु जी ॿी एक्स-रे में 25-30% फेफड़नि जो मुखुज़ो नज़र आयो। इन संजीदा मसले जे करे, तव्हां खे 12/13 खां 12/23 इन्टिउबेशन (साहु जी नली) करणो पियो।

answer: तव्हांखे एस्चेरिचिया कोलाई सबब थियल म्यूकोट्रॉमा लाइ सेफ्ट्रियाक्सोन एंटीबायोटिक्स ॾिना विया। तव्हांखे अस्पताल में निमोनिया लाइ मार्फेनियम एंटीबायोटिक्स ॾिना विया।

question: मूंखे छा दवा वठणो पवंदो?
answer: तव्हां हस्पताल में इस्तिमाल थियण वारियूं दवाऊं रखणु आया आहियो। लिस्ट में लोसार्टन, साइट्रोपिन, सिमवास्टैटिन, क्लोनाज़ेपैम, वैल्प्रोइक एसिड, फेनोबार्बिटल, ऐं फेनोफाइब्रेट कॉम्प्लेक्स शामिल आहिनि।

question: मूं हस्पताल वियोसि। छा मां सही थी वियसि?
answer: The underlying cause is usually an infectious process, such as "etiology", but aspiration pneumonia or hypoglycemia may also be a cause.

question: तव्हां खे केतिरो झेड़ो पियो आहे?
answer: तव्हां जे रतु में बीमारीअ जो इतिहास हो। डिफरेंशियल कल्चर जमा करण लाइ बायोप्सी, कल्चर इनसुलिन, बायोप्सी ऐं सिटी स्कैन सां जीव कार्बिनोसिस खे ख़त्म करण लाइ आयो।

question: छा हुन खे बोल्ड ग्रुप मिलियो आहे?
answer: ओह, सिटी स्कैन में ज़ाहिरु पियो थिए त तव्हांखे दिल ऐं दिमाग़ जी 25% धमनी अवरुद्धी आहे। तव्हां निकोपरीन नाले हिकु एंटीकोगुलेंट जो इलाज शुरू कयो आहे।

question: तव्हां खे स्कैन में छा नज़र आयो?
answer: कंप्यूटेड टोमोग्राफी में खोपड़ी जे एंटीरियर, पोस्टीरियर, या पोस्टीरियर कॉर्टिकल, सबकोर्टिकल, हाइपोस्टेनोसिस में को बि बेक़ाइदगी ज़ाहिरु कोन थी।

question: Can you see the report from my IEG report?
answer: तव्हांजी इलेक्ट्रोएन्सेफलोग्राम (ईईजी) जी रीडिंग ग़ैरमामूली हुई। नतीजतन 'ॻिहिरो ग़ैरमामूली वियोॻार वारी कारकर्दगी' ज़ाहिर थी, जेका 'ज़रह खां पोइ जे दिमाग़ी ज़ख़्मी' सां हमआहंग आहे। इन खां सवाइ, दिमाग़ जो मैग्नेटिक रेजोनेंस इमेजिंग (एमआरआई) स्कैन 'ज़ख़्मनि जा पेचीदा नमूना' ॾेखारियो।

answer: तव्हां खे 2000 में ह्यूमन इम्यूनोडेफिशिएंसी वायरस जी तशख़ीस कई वेई हुई। अगस्त 2020 में, तव्हां जो वायरल लोड (सीवी) न ॾिठो वियो, ऐं तव्हां जी सीडी4 जी गिनती 904 हुई।

question: मूंखे पंहिंजे मथे जे सूर जे लाइ केतिरो दवा खाइणो पवंदो?
answer: तव्हां जेके दवाऊं रोज़ानी वठंदा आहियो, उहे आहिनि 250 मिलीग्राम वैलप्रोइक एसिड ऐं रात जो 2.5 मिलीग्राम क्लोनाज़ेपैम। तव्हां जा गुज़िरियल रिकार्ड ॾेखारिनि था त तव्हां पहिरियों भेरो 2017 में क्लोनाज़ेपैम वरतो हो ऐं तव्हां जो मोटरसाइकिल इंश्योरेंस...

discharge_summary: admission: 12/06, discharge: 12/21, stay: 14 d 11 h, location: ward, payer: sus. 1. heart failure profile c dobutamine on 12/07 and 12/08, 2. abscess in the left thigh, osteomyelitis in the pubis, fournier's syndrome, drainage on 12/03 with ultrasound and drain placement on 12/15, treatment with ceftriaxone guided by culture of abscess escherichia coli multi s colonized antibiotic therapy after shock, incision in intensive care unit on 12/17 with abundant purulent secretion, {omitted}. 3. septic shock from cutaneous urinary focus on 12/16 polymyxin d0 12/15 amikacin and vancomycin on 12/17, 4. chronic kidney disease acute dialysis by fistula on 12/16 5. cardiorespiratory arrest with pulseless electrical activity, 10 minutes after intubation report of previous bradycardia, follow-up appointment after 1 minute of cardiopulmonary resuscitation, 6. vt with pulse after cardiorespiratory arrest, effective electrical cardioversion with a shock. [person] presenting with instability in the last half hour, requiring norepinephrine elevation up to 1.5 mcg/kg/min. progresses with bradycardia, QRS widening, and worsening shock. Given the hyperkalemia even after hemodialysis, 2 ampoules of calcium gluconate and 100 ml of bicarbonate were administered, and the respiratory rate was increased on the ventilator in order to reduce pco2 and consequently k. 2 ampoules of atropine were administered without benefit. [person] progressed to asystolic cardiorespiratory arrest, {omitted} in refractory shock. I declare {omitted} dead, due to absence of central pulses, pupils in fixed mydriasis, absence of heart sounds and asytole on the monitor, as well as absence of brainstem reflexes. The body was released. I request contact with the family. I await the death certificate to be completed. Death. Drainage of Fournier's gangrene. Death.
question: मुंहिंजो छोकाड़ो दोस्तु कीअं बीमारु पियो?
answer: He had a lesion on his right hand, and he was suffering from STW and Crohn's disease. The lesion culture was found to be positive for Escherichia coli. There was a suspicion of septic skin and urinary tract infections.

question: Or is it not a sign?
answer: अड़े, तव्हां हैरान थी विया, हुनखे साहु खणण में तक़लीफ़ थी रही हुई। पहिरीं, नारपेनेफ़्रिन ॾियणु खां पोइ हुनखे ख़राब महसूस थियो, पोइ हुनखे ब्रडीकार्डिया (दिल जी धड़कन) ऐं हिकु वॾो स्ट्रोक पियो। दवा जे इस्तेमाल खां पोइ, हुनखे इस्केमिक हार्ट डिज़ीज़ ऐं हिकु स्ट्रोक पियो जंहिं सां साहु खणण में तक़लीफ़ थी।

question: छा ऐं कंहिं ऑपरेशन जे तरीक़े सां संदसि जान बचायो वियो?
answer: ॿी सुबुह, हुन खे नॉरएपिनेफ्रिन ॾिनो वियो, पर संदसि हालत वधीक ख़राब थी वेई ऐं हुन खे कैल्शियम ग्लूकोनेट, बाइकार्बोनेट ऑफ़ सोडा, ऐं एट्रोपिन ॾिनो वियो, पर कंहिं बि मदद न कई।

question: छा तव्हां इंफ़ेक्शन जे बारे में कुझु ॿुधायो?
answer: उंहिं शख़्स जो पेटु खोल्हियो वियो, अंदर जो हिस्सो कढियो वियो, ऐं पेट जो अंदर जो हिस्सो कढियो वियो। नतीजे तौर, पेट जो गुहा ख़ाली थी वियो। सेफ़्ट्रियाक्सोन, पॉलीमिक्ज़िन, एमिकासिन, ऐं वैनकोमाइसिन जहिड़नि एंटीबायोटिक्स सां इलाज कयो वियो।

question: मूं हुन खे डायलिसिस जे लाइ वेंदड़ ॾिठो। हुन जो नओं नालो छा आहे?
answer: प्रस्तुति "ॿ-तरफ़ा कॉर्नियल कंक्रिशन" जो बयानु कयो ऐं ज़रूरी "12/16 हार्ड लेंस" जो बयानु कयो।

answer: हुन खे दिल जो दौरे पियो ऐं "दिल जो दौरे ऐं साहु जी नाकामी" सां हुन जो मौतु थी वियो।

question: छा हुन खे हस्पताल वठी वञणु पवंदो? छा हुन खे कोरोना वायरस जो संक्रमणु थियो आहे?
answer: तव्हां जी सिहत सिर में चोट, टुटल नाड़ी ऐं पानी जी कमी सबब ख़राब थी वेई, तंहिंकरे तव्हां खे ॿिए अस्पताल में मुंतक़िल कयो वियो। पर, तव्हां जे कोरोना वायरस पी.सी.आर. टेस्ट जो नतीजो नेगेटिव आयो।

question: छा मां वढ़ो लॻो?
answer: You are given antibiotics, a check for Clostridium poisoning, and metronidazole.

question: मुंहिंजो वज़न घटिजी वियो आहे। केतिरो घटिजी वियो आहे?
answer: पंहिंजी शिफ्ट जी शुरुआत में, संदसि वज़न 210 किलो हो; हाणे संदसि वज़न 144 किलो आहे।

question: केतिरा मुलाक़ातूं मुंहिंजे लाइ बाकी आहिनि?
answer: तव्हां जी इलेक्ट्रोएन्सेफलोग्राफी जी अगली अपॉइंटमेंट 12/01/2020 ते आहे, ऐं फैट कंसल्टेशन जे लाइ, आउट पेशेंट कंसल्टेशन 10/11/2020 ते आहे। तव्हां खे पंहिंजी फिजियोथेरेपी ऐं न्यूट्रिशन टीम जी हिदायतुनि ते बि अमल करणु घुरिजे।
